lgp.core.evolution.population

Class LinearCrossover<T>

  • RecombinationOperator
    • lgp.core.evolution.population.LinearCrossover<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class LinearCrossover<T>
extends RecombinationOperator

    A class RecombinationOperator that implements Linear Crossover for two individuals.

    For more information, see Algorithm 5.1 from Linear Genetic Programming (Brameier, M., Banzhaf, W. 2001).

    See Also:
    class RecombinationOperator

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      A class RecombinationOperator that implements Linear Crossover for two individuals.

      Combines the two individuals given by exchanging two segments of instructions.
      ModuleInformation getInformation()
      Provides information about the module.
      int getMaximumCrossoverDistance()
      An upper bound on the number of instructions between the two chosen segments.

      An upper bound on the size of the segments exchanged between the individuals.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinearCrossover

        public LinearCrossover(Environment<T> environment,
                       int maximumSegmentLength,
                       int maximumCrossoverDistance,
                       int maximumSegmentLengthDifference)

        A class RecombinationOperator that implements Linear Crossover for two individuals.

        For more information, see Algorithm 5.1 from Linear Genetic Programming (Brameier, M., Banzhaf, W. 2001).

        Parameters:
        maximumSegmentLength - An upper bound on the size of the segments exchanged between the individuals.
        maximumCrossoverDistance - An upper bound on the number of instructions between the two chosen segments.
        maximumSegmentLengthDifference - An upper bound on the difference between the two segment lengths.
        See Also:
        class RecombinationOperator
